articles.title: Takeaways: Captain Brady Tkachuk plays the role of hero in Ottawa Senators OT win in Winnipeg
articles.description: Captain Brady Tkachuk came through in the crunch. The Ottawa Senators’ captain fired home the winner in overtime to secure a thrilling 3-2 overtime comeback victory over the Winnipeg Jets on Monday night at the Canada Life Centre.
